DPR "DREAM PERFECT REGIME"

Creators of visually stunning music videos

DPR stands for "Dream Perfect Regime" and is a independent, multigenre, music and video group. There is DPR LIVE which consists of Hong Da-bin (홍다빈) and DPR IAN also known as ROME, he is pictured above and is a Korean-Aussie rapper, director and composer under DPR.

DPR LIVE Facts.

  • 1. He was born in South Korea.
  • 2. When he was about 5 years old, he moved to Guam and lived there for 13 years.
  • 3. He spent half his life in Guam and half in Korea.
  • 4. He is fluent in Korean and English.
  • 5. He is also known as Jelly Man.
  • 6. His tagline is “coming to you live!”
  • 7. He is a former member of a dance group called NEWE$T CREW.
  • 8. He was also in Kill.U.Strate with Barom, a former member of C-Clown.
  • 9. He considers DPR his family.
  • 10. He has already enlisted in the military.
  • 11. He has a scar located on his forehead.
  • 12. He is a dog person.
  • 13. He is right handed.
  • 14. He used to work at Subway.
  • 15. He came up with the name LIVE to remind himself of two motives: ”to always live life in the present, both through ups & downs and through success & failures” and “to always remain honest and true to one’s self and one’s craft”.
  • 16. He joined DPR around March 2015.
  • 17. In the song “To Whoever” he mentions that he was bullied in school for his skin colour.
  • 18. He’s a dog person.
